code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  countthe  hillthe  valley ( vector < int >&  nums )  {   int  ans  =  0 ;   int  left  =  nums [ 0 ];   for  ( int  i  =  1 ;  i  +  1  <  nums . size ();  ++ i )   if  ( left  <  nums [ i ]  &&  nums [ i ]  >  nums [ i  +  1 ]  ||    left  >  nums [ i ]  &&  nums [ i ]  <  nums [ i  +  1 ])  {    ++ ans ;   left  =  nums [ i ];   }   return  ans ;   }  };
